constituent: vulgar, person, valley, eight, umbrella, mouth
heisigStory: Person . . . valley. The key word should be taken in its older sense of "popular" or "commonplace."
koohiiStory1: Mr. T says, "Don´t be like them valley girls, always speaking vulgar language and acting all vulgar! They ain´t nothing but foos!".
koohiiStory2: Mr T meets the vulgar (common) people of the valley and participates in the vulgar customs (folkways). Looking at the vulgar (common) people, Mr T says - “I pity you foo!”.
myStory: chữ tục. phong tục. tục tằn. người ở thung lũng rất tục. nhân + cốc
words: manners, customs, sex service, sex industry
people, race, nation, racial customs, folk customs
